text: Portland Thorns FC is an American soccer club which began play in the National Women's Soccer League in its inaugural season in 2013. All rostered players during the NWSL season (including the playoffs) are included, even if they did not make an appearance. Amateur call-ups from 2013 to 2017 are included only if they made an appearance. Statistics are correct ; they are updated once a year after the conclusion of the NWSL season. == All-time roster and appearances == {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- !
